_header: O angel dear wherever I go
_description: A prayer to the Guardian Angel — five quatrains plus burden (c): ‘To þe gud angell’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
O angell dere wher euer I gooMe that am comytted to thyne
                    awarde…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Govern my dedis & thowght in fereTo þe plesaunce of
                    god both day & nyghtExplicit
